doc:
Carlos Casaravilla https://en.wikipedia.org/wiki/Carlos_Casaravilla 0 Carlos Casaravilla (12 October 1900 – 17 February 1981) was an Uruguayan actor. He appeared in 85 films between 1934 and 1978. He starred in the film El Lazarillo de Tormes, which won the Golden Bear at the 10th Berlin International Film Festival. Carlos_Casaravilla ( 12_October_1900 – 17_February_1981 ) was an_Uruguayan_actor . He appeared in 85_films between 1934_and_1978 . He starred in the_film_El_Lazarillo de Tormes , which won the_Golden_Bear at the_10th_Berlin_International_Film_Festival .
